statements: DELETE FROM inventory_metrics WHERE product_id = 100 AND inventory_level < 50;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE id = 10 AND stock_level > 5;
DELETE FROM sales WHERE sale_amount < 1000 AND profit_margin > 0.2;
DELETE FROM stock_levels WHERE location_id = 200 AND stock_quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM stock_levels WHERE stock_level < 10 AND last_updated < '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 500 AND expense_category = 'Marketing' AND expense_date < '2021-12-31';
